name: nav
title: Nav
description: Roll your own navigation style by extending the base .nav component.

options.name: type
options.description: Type of the navigation. Use navbar type in conjuction with <vs-navbar> element.

options.name: active
options.description: An active state on the individual <vs-nav-item>.

options.name: disabled
options.description: A disabled state on the individual <vs-nav-item>.

options.name: link
options.description: Nav items support vue-router style links or regular href values.
